Reviews.Title: I want to be able to watch dvds/Blueray movies, and must more
Reviews.Author: have problems  with playing sometimes it does...
Reviews.Content: I do not have one yet, but it seems to have at all. one thing not mentioned is battey life. can I watch one dvd movie or more before recharging? Does it have another battery or faster recharging capability?

ProductInfo.Features:
4th Gen Intel Core i7-4700MQ (2.4GHz, 6MB L3 Cache) Quad Core CPU, Genuine Windows 8.1 64-Bit
17.3 inch Ten Point Multi-Gesture Touch Screen LED-backlit display, 1920-by-1080p FULL HD resolution
2GB GDDR3 NVIDIA ® GeForce® GT 740M with OptimusTM Tech; 16GB DDR3L 1600MHz SDRAM
960GB Performance SSD Drive + 2TB Storage Drive; Intel® Dual Band Wireless-AC 7260 (867Mbps)
Full Size Backlit Keyboard, HD Webcam; Beats Audio, HDMI, Fingerprint Reader, 1 Year HP Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY TouchSmart 17t-j100 17.3" Quad Edition FULL HD Touch Screen EXTREME PERFORMANCE & STORAGE Notebook PC (Intel Core i7-4700MQ, 16GB DDR3L RAM, Beats Audio, 960GB SSD + 2TB Storage, 2GB NVIDIA 740M Gaming Graphics)
